description:
Yua delivers the distressing news that the animation studio still hasn`t caught up, so they`ll either have to remain stock-still again or find a new way to get through the episode with limited animation. At the club, the topic is a judo club, followed by a judo-related activity in the gym that embarrasses Koharu to the max!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Anata wa Utsukushii ga Reitan Da
あなたは美しいが冷淡だ
